channel.title: Resource Packages on Telco Network Cloud Orchestration Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Resource Packages on Telco Network Cloud Orchestration Learning Center

item.title: Overview
item.description: Structure The structure of a resource package is determined by the resource manager that uses it. For Brent, see Brent Resource Packages. Next Steps Once you understand the basics of a Resource package, you may move on to understand Drivers and how they are used by Brent to manage the Resource.
